 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחַץ‎</span> **verb** ==smite through, wound severely, shatter== (poetry) (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ma—âƒu***</u></abbr>, ***smite, wound***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 398</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***churn; beat or agitate*** the milk, etc.; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מחֿץֿ‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZXG xxx. 1876, 684; xxxvii. 1883, 338; Burgen u. Schlösser (SB. xcvii. 1881), 965</sup> (of stone-cutter's work), [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chrestom. 127</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Job.26.12|Job 26:12]] + 3 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמחֲצָה‎</span> [[Judg.5.26|Judg 5:26]] etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְחַץ‎</span> [[Job.5.18|Job 5:18]]; [[Ps.68.22|Ps 68:22]] 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶמְחָצֵם‎</span> [[Ps.18.39|Ps 18:39]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָא‎</span> [[2Sam.22.39|2Sam 22:39]] — ***smite through***, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראֹשׁוֺ‎</span>, of Jael, [[Judg.5.26|Judg 5:26]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָלַם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחַק‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָלַף‎</span>); of Israel, ***shattering*** enemies, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִצָּיו יִמ‎</span> [[Num.24.8|Num 24:8]] (object omitted; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַצְמֹתֵיהֶם יְגָרֵם‎</span>) compare v[[Num.24.17|Num 24:17]] (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ַפּאֲתֵי מוֺאָב‎</span>); compare [[Ps.18.39|Ps 18:39]] = [[2Sam.22.39|2Sam 22:39]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>,***smiting through or shattering*** his foes, [[Ps.110.5|Ps 110:5]] their heads v[[Ps.110.6|Ps 110:6]]; [[Ps.68.22|Ps 68:22]]; [[Hab.3.13|Hab 3:13]], loins [[Deut.33.1|Deut 33:1]] compare [[Job.26.12|Job 26:12]] object  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַהַב‎</span>, q. v.; absolute, [[Deut.32.39|Deut 32:39]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפָא‎</span>; \|\| clause <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָמִית וַאֲחַיֶּה‎</span>) compare [[Job.5.18|Job 5:18]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפָא‎</span>, \|\| clause <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַכְאִיב וְיֶחְבָּ֑שׁ‎</span>). For <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּמְחַץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגלך בְּדָם‎</span> [[Ps.68.24|Ps 68:24]], read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְחַץ‎</span> ([[Ps.58.11|Ps 58:11]]), [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] [[BDB#Br|Br]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] [[BDB#We|We]].
